nodes.text: Explosives, Heavy Weapons and Unstable Elements

Explosives, Heavy Weapons and Unstable Elements is the fourteenth issue in the canon reference book series Star Wars Encyclopedia, published by De Agostini in Spain on February 2, 2021 and Altaya in France on February 5, 2021. It was published in Mexico on March 22, 2021.

The ability to cause mass destruction was not unique to a particular species or culture in the galaxy. Everywhere, there have always been minds dedicated to creating weapons of any kind, with the potential to destroy the maximum number of enemies at once. Whether on one side or the other, installed on a starship, fixed on a planetary site or as light portable devices, many of these weapons relied on highly volatile natural or artificial elements, which released energies that sometimes resulted difficult to handle by inexperienced hands.
